text: Balloon () is a 2019 Chinese drama film directed by Pema Tseden. It was screened in the Horizons section at the 76th Venice International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Tso Yangshik * Wangmo Sonam ==Accolades== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date !! Award !! Category !!
